column4: well fokus, i got the driver installed, and everything seems to be reporting correctly
and my bit depth is locked at 24

I installed nvidia drivers for my 7600gt last night and my res is stuck at 800x600.  I've run nvidia-xconfig and nvidia-settings.  The resolutions are listed in my xorg.conf, but they aren't showing up.  Any suggestions?
the nvidia drivers out the repo work
the refresh rate is right in xorg, but the res keeps capping at 1024.768 and i'm still locked at 800.600
they are no the ones from the ubuntu repo
